_header: Egg our hearts Lord of might
_description: Translation of a collect (Sunday Advent 2), Excita, Domine, corda nostra — two couplets in a Latin sermon

WorcF126.Transcription:
Egge our hertes, lord of mythþi sonys weyis so to
                    dythþat we mowen wen he comeþwyþ worþi work hem
                    welcomin
